name: Retro Adventures for Pete's Sake
description:
Title music by Jonpon Jonpon

other music by Spring Spring

arrows to move, space and m keys for actions

Sadly, I don't have the time to finish all I'd hoped for.

I have learnt so much doing these jams and have made it my goal to try and use as many features of the engine as possible. Thanks, Wild Jam and thank you Godot, you're number 1.
